name: Let's Battle Online
description:
Cross-playable, competitive online game

3-player battle for the win!
You win when your opponent is knocked off the field or reduced to 0 HP!

Equip 2 specials, 2 weapons, and armor to fight.
Collect unique items and find the strongest combination!

1 vs 1 single mode
2 vs. 2 cooperative multiplayer mode
Fight together with a friend in the cooperative multiplayer mode!

Controls
Q: Dash
W: Use Special 1
E: Use Special 2
R: Use Weapon 1
T:Use Weapon 2
